name: Cops Vs Robber... DONUTS!?!
description:
WASD to move, HOLD CLICK to feed cops, ESCAPE to reject donut.

You are a robber donut. You must steal from the cops by distracting them with donuts and absorbing their money. Good Luck! (Made for ScoreSpace Jam #20)

Font Used: RubberBiscuit https://www.1001fonts.com/rubber-biscuit-font.html
